param.name: basedownloadpath
param.label: Base Download Path
param.description: Enter the path to the folder that any requested download file must be underneath (eg. images/downloads would allow a person to download a file that has the path of images/downloads/applications/app.exe, but would not allow something like components/com_component/controller.php)

param.name: cipherenabled
param.label: Enable Cipher
param.description: Should the path be encrypted? (Note: if this is set to yes, the fields below must also be set correctly).

param.name: log_downloads
param.label: Log Downloads
param.description: If set to yes, downloads will be logged to #__simpledownload_hits table.

param.name: cipherfile
param.label: Cipher File
param.description: The path to the file that will be used to encrypt and decrypt the file path.

param.name: cipherfunction
param.label: Cipher Function
param.description: The function to call (thats located in the cipher file) that will encrypt the file path.

param.name: decipherfunction
param.label: Decipher Function
param.description: The function to call (thats located in the cipher file) that will decrypt the file path.

param.name: title_filenotfound
param.label: File Not Found Page Title
param.description: Page title to show when the file requested is not found.

param.name: msg_filenotfound
param.default:
File Not Found

The file you were requesting could not be found. We're sorry for the inconvenience.
param.label: File Not Found Msg
param.description: Enter the message you would like to be displayed in the case where the file is not found.

param.name: title_badcomponentconfiguration
param.label: Invalid Component Configuration Page Title
param.description: Page title to show when the component mis-configuration message is shown.

param.name: msg_badcomponentconfiguration
param.default:
Administrative Configuration Required

We were unable to complete your request because the component has not been completely or correctly configured. You may want to contact the site administrator about this problem.
param.label: Invalid Component Configuration Msg
param.description: Enter the message you would like to be displayed when this component is not configured correctly.
